segments.text: I can see that . But why are you reading advertisements for houses for sale ? Are you buying a house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not yet . But I like to see what is available .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have a look as well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , this one looks really good . And look at the garden . So beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , nice . But I prefer this wooden house with a garden fence and a sloping roof .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but my house has large windows and so gets lots of sun . And it has a small balcony at the top .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you can't compare a small balcony to this large veranda . This is perfect for having a barbecue in summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Talking about a barbecue , didn't you say you are organizing one next week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , next Saturday . I hope you can make it .
segments.speaker: S2
